CustomField.description: Enter the 18 character Salesforce ID of the Account that should be used in the Engagio Activities API call. This is useful for testing. Blank this field if not testing as all api calls will be filtered by this account in the Engagio database.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the 18 character Salesforce ID of the Account that should be used in the Engagio Activities API call. This is useful for testing. Blank this field if not testing as all api calls will be filtered by this account in the Engagio database.
CustomField.label: Engagio API Test Account Filter
